hard: Helios - Jet gives his teammates a critical hit chance. Each time an allied hero will critical deal damage Helios will deal damage to that hero.
Jhu – Jet in most team compositions stands as the last hero. Jhu will take Thea out of the game really fast once he activates his “I See You” skill
soft: Armor artifact – Jet provides allies with physical damage boosting abilities, armor artifact will deny overall damage from the hero who Jet is supporting.
Celeste – Denies healing from Jet’s “Elixir of Vigor” skill
